name: payroll
description: Payroll system with Electron desktop app

scripts.dev: concurrently -n back,front -c yellow,cyan "npm --prefix back run dev" "npm --prefix front run start"
scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently -n electron,back,front -c magenta,yellow,cyan "wait-on http://localhost:4000 && electron ." "npm --prefix back run dev" "npm --prefix front run start"
scripts.desktop:build: npm run desktop:build:prep && npm run build:win
scripts.desktop:build:prep: npm --prefix back run build 2>/dev/null || true && npm --prefix front run build 2>/dev/null || true
